body:
Ask me about anything; Avicus related when I was admin, life, random stuff or whatever tickles your fancy.
I'll answer with honesty since this server will be closing soon.

title: Going with the flow - AMA

replies.body:
Jozz my man!
What games are you into atm?
Over the years, what do you think were the highest and lowest moments for the Avicus Administrative team?
Your thoughts on ALM becoming owner at the time?
replies.body_tagged:
Jozz my man!
What games are you into atm?
Over the years, what do you think were the highest and lowest moments for the Avicus Administrative team?
Your thoughts on ALM becoming owner at the time?

replies.body: Opinions?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions?

replies.body:
Overwatch and GTA V mostly.
The highest would be when I first was given the opportunity to administrate the server(skipping manager rank), and then influencing how the staff ran at the time; just interacting with the staff was awesome. The lowest would be the second time I was admin, where I came back to a lot of distrust between senior staff members - nothing was working because the damage was done, the only solution was to demote everyone and start again but we all know how everyone would have reacted. 
I can understand why ALM was given owner, he has done some pretty neat stuff with the server but when I left Avicus, it was mostly full of ALM abusing his developer permissions and then being hypocritical. All in all I think ALM had good intentions, and is a nice bloke but yeah.
replies.body_tagged:
Overwatch and GTA V mostly.
The highest would be when I first was given the opportunity to administrate the server(skipping manager rank), and then influencing how the staff ran at the time; just interacting with the staff was awesome. The lowest would be the second time I was admin, where I came back to a lot of distrust between senior staff members - nothing was working because the damage was done, the only solution was to demote everyone and start again but we all know how everyone would have reacted. 
I can understand why ALM was given owner, he has done some pretty neat stuff with the server but when I left Avicus, it was mostly full of ALM abusing his developer permissions and then being hypocritical. All in all I think ALM had good intentions, and is a nice bloke but yeah.

replies.body:
Junr the legend, how's Overwatch going? 

When I first met you, you came off as immature which is why I think you struggled getting staff in the first place - but as time went on you became a small leader for younger staff members, so you always stay in the good books; haven't heard anything negative about you at all!
